ASCML - Agent Society Configuration Manager and Launcher

jade.tools.ascml.dependencymanager
Class DependencyManangerLibrary

java.lang.Object
  jade.tools.ascml.dependencymanager.DependencyManangerLibrary

public class DependencyManangerLibrary
extends java.lang.Object

The DependencyManangerLibrary stores information about started models. You can lookup which agent-type a specific AID belongs to, or get the IRunnableSocietyInstance for a specific society-name. (But only if it was started through this ASCML)

Author:
Sven Lilienthal (ascml@sven-lilienthal.de)

addAgent

public boolean addAgent(jade.core.AID agentAID,
                        IRunnableAgentInstance agentInstanceModel)
Add a specific agent to the library, so that you can lookup the IRunnableAgentInstance belonging to an AID later on.

Parameters:
agentAID - The AID of the agent
agentInstanceModel - The IRunnableAgentInstance of the agent
Returns:
false If the agent already is in the library, true if it was added successfully

Parameters:
name - The local name of the agent
agentInstanceModel - The IRunnableAgentInstance of the agent
Returns:
false If the agent already is in the library, true if it was added successfully

Parameters:
name - The full qualified name of the society
societyInstanceModel - The IRunnableSocietyInstance of the society

lookupAgentType

public java.lang.String lookupAgentType(java.lang.String name)
                                 throws jade.core.NotFoundException

Parameters:
name - The local name to lookup in the library
Returns:
The full qualified name of the agent-type the local name belongs to
Throws:
jade.core.NotFoundException - Throws a NotFoundException if the local name was not found in the library
